original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1051)@</color>    乘著蒙衝與自己的部隊到達指定地點，且以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(746)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對範圍內敵方造成物理傷害。同時在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4504)@</color> 秒內強化自身 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Int(4509)@</color> 點智力和武力，以及強化己部隊全體士兵 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Int(4504)@</color> 點武力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1051)@</color> Ride Meng Chong and your troops to the designated place, and use <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(746)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> causes physical damage to the enemy within the range. At the same time, strengthen oneself in <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4504)@</color> seconds <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Int(4509)@</color> point intelligence and strength, and strengthen all soldiers of one's own troops<color=#ccffcc>$Status_Int(4504)@</color> Use force.
